creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Play a sport with Kinomap as it turns your bike trainer, exercise bike, treadmill or rowing machine into a powerful and fun fitness. Choose a video and train on the Kinomap app. The app will adjust the incline or resistance in real-time according to the elevation profile or structured workout.

The popular app is taking the next step to provide sport participants with a platform that will combine kilometers of real-life footage to train indoors as if they were outside, coaching content, multi-player sessions, official indoor races and more. Kinomap is on the way to becoming a reference application for anyone looking to play a sport indoors.

If you don’t have an interactive machine, you can still activate the front-facing camera as a stride, cadence or stroke sensor. Or pair with any existing ANT+ or Bluetooth smart sensor available on the market (cadence, stride, speed&cadence, heart rate strap or chest belt, power meter…)

Main features:
• VIDEO CONTENT
Thousands of videos are made at your disposal giving you access to the most popular routes, iconic climbs or just sightseeing tours. The world is yours.
• STRUCTURED WORKOUT
The app gives you access to a set of structured workouts and interval programs.
Interactive coaching videos are at your disposal for indoor cycling, running and rowing.
• SOCIAL
You can Follow users and video makers, Like and comment the videos, Access to the notification center, Collect badges and rewards…
• DISPLAY
The app is optimized on Android smartphones and tablets, but you can also do a mirroring to an external scree, using any ChromeCast key or just a basic hdmi adaptor. A remote display feature is now available, giving you the ability to display the video on any web browser by just flashing the QR code set on http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes:
• The APP is free to download, and the free version already gives you access to all features and a set of free videos for testing with no limitation of time. A subscription may be required later on to get access to the entire eligible content and virtually travel the world.
• The current license is set for individual use at home, up to over 2.5 hours/day or 15 hours/week. For medical, corporate or commercial use, please contact us.
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc.. but also any Bluetooth/ANT+ sensors (power sensor, speed&cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly rather than make a bad rating or comment here. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is critical to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.
descriptionShort: Indoor training app with more than 120.000 miles for cycling, running & rowing

title: Kinomap - Indoor training videos

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Play a sport with Kinomap as it turns your bike trainer, exercise bike, treadmill or rowing machine into a powerful and fun fitness. Choose a video and train on the Kinomap app. The app will adjust the incline or resistance in real-time according to the elevation profile or structured workout.

The popular app is taking the next step to provide sport participants with a platform that will combine kilometers of real-life footage to train indoors as if they were outside, coaching content, multi-player sessions, official indoor races and more. Kinomap is on the way to becoming a reference application for anyone looking to play a sport indoors.

If you don’t have an interactive machine, you can still activate the front-facing camera as a stride, cadence or stroke sensor. Or pair with any existing ANT+ or Bluetooth smart sensor available on the market (cadence, stride, speed&cadence, heart rate strap or chest belt, power meter…)

Main features:
• VIDEO CONTENT
Thousands of videos are made at your disposal giving you access to the most popular routes, iconic climbs or just sightseeing tours. The world is yours.
• STRUCTURED WORKOUT
The app gives you access to a set of structured workouts and interval programs.
Interactive coaching videos are at your disposal for indoor cycling, running and rowing.
• SOCIAL
You can Follow users and video makers, Like and comment the videos, Access to the notification center, Collect badges and rewards…
• DISPLAY
The app is optimized on Android smartphones and tablets, but you can also do a mirroring to an external screen, using any ChromeCast key or just an HDMI adaptor. A remote display feature is now available, giving you the ability to display the video on any web browser by just flashing the QR code set on http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes:
• You need to create an account on the Kinomap website to use the app
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc.. but also any Bluetooth/ANT+ sensors (power sensor, speed&cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is critical to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.

title: Kinomap - Indoor training videos

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Play a sport with Kinomap as it turns your bike trainer, exercise bike, treadmill or rowing machine into a powerful and fun fitness. Choose a video and train on the Kinomap app. The app will adjust the incline or resistance in real-time according to the elevation profile or structured workout.

The popular app is taking the next step to provide sport participants with a platform that will combine kilometers of real-life footage to train indoors as if they were outside, coaching content, multi-player sessions, official indoor races and more. Kinomap is on the way to becoming a reference application for anyone looking to play a sport indoors.

If you don’t have an interactive machine, you can still activate the front-facing camera as a stride, cadence or stroke sensor. Or pair with any existing ANT+ or Bluetooth smart sensor available on the market (cadence, stride, speed&cadence, heart rate strap or chest belt, power meter…)

Main features:
• VIDEO CONTENT
Thousands of videos are made at your disposal giving you access to the most popular routes, iconic climbs or just sightseeing tours. The world is yours.
• STRUCTURED WORKOUT
The app gives you access to a set of structured workouts and interval programs.
Interactive coaching videos are at your disposal for indoor cycling, running and rowing.
• SOCIAL
You can Follow users and video makers, Like and comment the videos, Access to the notification center, Collect badges and rewards…
• DISPLAY
The app is optimized on Android smartphones and tablets, but you can also do a mirroring to an external screen, using any ChromeCast key or just an HDMI adaptor. A remote display feature is now available, giving you the ability to display the video on any web browser by just flashing the QR code set on http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes:
• You need to create an account on the Kinomap website to use the app
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc.. but also any Bluetooth/ANT+ sensors (power sensor, speed&cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is critical to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.

descriptionHtml:
Play a sport with Kinomap as it turns your bike trainer, exercise bike, treadmill or rowing machine into a powerful and fun fitness. Choose a video and train on the Kinomap app. The app will adjust the incline or resistance in real-time according to the elevation profile or structured workout.

The popular app is taking the next step to provide sport participants with a platform that will combine kilometers of real-life footage to train indoors as if they were outside, coaching content, multi-player sessions, official indoor races and more. Kinomap is on the way to becoming a reference application for anyone looking to play a sport indoors.

If you don’t have an interactive machine, you can still activate the front-facing camera as a stride, cadence or stroke sensor. Or pair with any existing ANT+ or Bluetooth smart sensor available on the market (cadence, stride, speed&cadence, heart rate strap or chest belt, power meter…)

Main features:
• VIDEO CONTENT
Thousands of videos are made at your disposal giving you access to the most popular routes, iconic climbs or just sightseeing tours. The world is yours.
• STRUCTURED WORKOUT
The app gives you access to a set of structured workouts and interval programs.
Interactive coaching videos are at your disposal for indoor cycling, running and rowing.
• SOCIAL
You can Follow users and video makers, Like and comment the videos, Access to the notification center, Collect badges and rewards…
• DISPLAY
The app is optimized on Android smartphones and tablets, but you can also do a mirroring to an external screen, using any ChromeCast key or just an HDMI adaptor. A remote display feature is now available, giving you the ability to display the video on any web browser by just flashing the QR code set on http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes:
• You need to create an account on the Kinomap website to use the app
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc.. but also any Bluetooth/ANT+ sensors (power sensor, speed&cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is critical to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.
descriptionShort: Indoor training app with more than 120.000 miles for cycling, running & rowing

Thousands of videos are made at your disposal giving you access to the most popular routes, iconic climbs or just sightseeing tours. The world is yours.
• STRUCTURED WORKOUT
The app gives you access to a set of structured workouts and interval programs.
Interactive coaching videos are at your disposal for indoor cycling, running and rowing.
• SOCIAL
You can Follow users and video makers, Like and comment the videos, Access to the notification center, Collect badges and rewards…
• DISPLAY
The app is optimized on Android smartphones and tablets, but you can also do a mirroring to an external screen, using any ChromeCast key or just an HDMI adaptor. A remote display feature is now available, giving you the ability to display the video on any web browser by just flashing the QR code set on http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes:
• You need to create an account on the Kinomap website to use the app
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc.. but also any Bluetooth/ANT+ sensors (power sensor, speed&cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is critical to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.

title: Kinomap

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Train and explore the world!
Kinomap is an interactive training app for indoor cycling, running and rowing. We are the world’s largest geolocated video sharing platform, with thousands of videos from the best tracks around the world. We pair to your equipment and respond to the inclines and resistance seen in the video on your screen.

This isn’t ‘at-home training’, this is the real thing.

With thousands of routes to discover, workouts to choose from, and a community of coaches and athletes to connect with, our range and variety means you will never get bored using Kinomap.

Simply create an account on kinomap.com, download the app to your mobile or tablet and start your 14-day trial. Choose a video and explore the world!

If your equipment is not interactive, you can use the front camera of your tablet/smartphone as an optical sensor or connect additional sensors (cadence sensor, stride sensor, speed sensor, power sensor).

Training modes
• Motion videos
With thousands of videos available, travel the world by bike, foot or rowing machine. You can discover tourist routes, exotic landscapes thousands of kilometres from home, test your abilities on demanding routes with mythical passes. The world is yours.

• Coaching videos and structured workout
Progress and reach your goals with coaching videos and structured training. Customise your own sessions or choose sessions shared by the community.

• Multiplayer mode
Challenge your friends or Kinomap users in multiplayer mode and chat with them. Schedule your sessions in advance by inviting your followers or join public sessions!

• Free ride
Create your own ride! Keep track of your indoor sessions with the free training mode. Kinomap records your activity.

Other features :
• Social
Share your Kinomap sessions with the community or also by connecting to other sports applications like Strava or Runtastic.

• Display
The application is optimized for iPhone and iPad. You can also display the videos on an external screen with an Apple TV or a simple HDMI adapter. A remote display is also offered from a simple web browser from the page http://remote.kinomap.com.

• Apple Watch
The app is compatible with Apple Watch to receive the heart rate data.

• Apple Health
The app can send data to Apple Health like distance, heart rate and calories

Notes
• This app includes in-app purchases for auto-renewable subscriptions. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.
Terms: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc. but also any Bluetooth sensors (power sensor, speed & cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is important to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.
descriptionShort: Indoor training app with thousands of real videos for cycling, running & rowing

We pair to your equipment and respond to the inclines and resistance seen in the video on your screen.

This isn’t ‘at-home training’, this is the real thing.

With thousands of routes to discover, workouts to choose from, and a community of coaches and athletes to connect with, our range and variety means you will never get bored using Kinomap.

Simply create an account on kinomap.com, download the app to your mobile or tablet and start your 14-day trial. Choose a video and explore the world!

If your equipment is not interactive, you can use the front camera of your tablet/smartphone as an optical sensor or connect additional sensors (cadence sensor, stride sensor, speed sensor, power sensor).

Training modes
• Motion videos
With thousands of videos available, travel the world by bike, foot or rowing machine. You can discover tourist routes, exotic landscapes thousands of kilometres from home, test your abilities on demanding routes with mythical passes. The world is yours.

• Coaching videos and structured workout
Progress and reach your goals with coaching videos and structured training. Customise your own sessions or choose sessions shared by the community.

• Multiplayer mode
Challenge your friends or Kinomap users in multiplayer mode and chat with them. Schedule your sessions in advance by inviting your followers or join public sessions!

• Free ride
Create your own ride! Keep track of your indoor sessions with the free training mode. Kinomap records your activity.

Other features :
• Social
Share your Kinomap sessions with the community or also by connecting to other sports applications like Strava or Runtastic.

• Display
The application is optimized for iPhone and iPad. You can also display the videos on an external screen with an Apple TV or a simple HDMI adapter. A remote display is also offered from a simple web browser from the page http://remote.kinomap.com.

• Apple Watch
The app is compatible with Apple Watch to receive the heart rate data.

• Apple Health
The app can send data to Apple Health like distance, heart rate and calories

Notes
• This app includes in-app purchases for auto-renewable subscriptions. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.
Terms: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc. but also any Bluetooth sensors (power sensor, speed & cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is important to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.

- 🐛 Bugs fixes and improvements

title: Kinomap

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Train and explore the world!
Kinomap is an interactive training app for indoor cycling, running and rowing. We are the world’s largest geolocated video sharing platform, with thousands of videos from the best tracks around the world. We pair to your equipment and respond to the inclines and resistance seen in the video on your screen.

This isn’t ‘at-home training’, this is the real thing.

With thousands of routes to discover, workouts to choose from, and a community of coaches and athletes to connect with, our range and variety means you will never get bored using Kinomap.

Simply create an account on kinomap.com, download the app to your mobile or tablet and start your 14-day trial. Choose a video and explore the world!

If your equipment is not interactive, you can use the front camera of your tablet/smartphone as an optical sensor or connect additional sensors (cadence sensor, stride sensor, speed sensor, power sensor).

Training modes
• Motion videos
With thousands of videos available, travel the world by bike, foot or rowing machine. You can discover tourist routes, exotic landscapes thousands of kilometres from home, test your abilities on demanding routes with mythical passes. The world is yours.

• Coaching videos and structured workout
Progress and reach your goals with coaching videos and structured training. Customise your own sessions or choose sessions shared by the community.

• Multiplayer mode
Challenge your friends or Kinomap users in multiplayer mode and chat with them. Schedule your sessions in advance by inviting your followers or join public sessions!

• Free ride
Create your own ride! Keep track of your indoor sessions with the free training mode. Kinomap records your activity.

Other features :
• Social
Share your Kinomap sessions with the community or also by connecting to other sports applications like Strava or Runtastic.

• Display
The application is optimized for iPhone and iPad. You can also display the videos on an external screen with an Apple TV or a simple HDMI adapter. A remote display is also offered from a simple web browser from the page http://remote.kinomap.com.

• Apple Watch
The app is compatible with Apple Watch to receive the heart rate data.

• Apple Health
The app can send data to Apple Health like distance, heart rate and calories

Notes
• This app includes in-app purchases for auto-renewable subscriptions. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.
Terms: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc. but also any Bluetooth sensors (power sensor, speed & cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is important to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.
descriptionShort: Indoor training app with thousands of real videos for cycling, running & rowing

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
-✨ You can now change your username directly in the app
-✨ You can now choose to not save your session
- 🐛 Improved ANT+, FTMS Compatibility
- 🐛 Fixed issue with JET9 Treadmill
- 🐛 Fixed many bugs and crashes

Kinomap is an interactive training app for indoor cycling, running and rowing. We are the world’s largest geolocated video sharing platform, with thousands of videos from the best tracks around the world. We pair to your equipment and respond to the inclines and resistance seen in the video on your screen.

This isn’t ‘at-home training’, this is the real thing.

With thousands of routes to discover, workouts to choose from, and a community of coaches and athletes to connect with, our range and variety means you will never get bored using Kinomap.

Simply create an account on kinomap.com, download the app to your mobile or tablet and start your 14-day trial. Choose a video and explore the world!

If your equipment is not interactive, you can use the front camera of your tablet/smartphone as an optical sensor or connect additional sensors (cadence sensor, stride sensor, speed sensor, power sensor).

Training modes
• Motion videos
With thousands of videos available, travel the world by bike, foot or rowing machine. You can discover tourist routes, exotic landscapes thousands of kilometres from home, test your abilities on demanding routes with mythical passes. The world is yours.

• Coaching videos and structured workout
Progress and reach your goals with coaching videos and structured training. Customise your own sessions or choose sessions shared by the community.

• Multiplayer mode
Challenge your friends or Kinomap users in multiplayer mode and chat with them. Schedule your sessions in advance by inviting your followers or join public sessions!

• Free ride
Create your own ride! Keep track of your indoor sessions with the free training mode. Kinomap records your activity.

Other features :
• Social
Share your Kinomap sessions with the community or also by connecting to other sports applications like Strava or Runtastic.

• Display
The application is optimized for iPhone and iPad. You can also display the videos on an external screen with an Apple TV or a simple HDMI adapter. A remote display is also offered from a simple web browser from the page http://remote.kinomap.com.

• Apple Watch
The app is compatible with Apple Watch to receive the heart rate data.

• Apple Health
The app can send data to Apple Health like distance, heart rate and calories

Notes
• This app includes in-app purchases for auto-renewable subscriptions. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.
Terms: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc. but also any Bluetooth sensors (power sensor, speed & cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is important to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.
descriptionShort: Indoor training app with thousands of real videos for cycling, running & rowing

title: Kinomap

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Train and explore the world!
Kinomap is an interactive training app for indoor cycling, running and rowing. We are the world’s largest geolocated video sharing platform, with thousands of videos from the best tracks around the world. We pair to your equipment and respond to the inclines and resistance seen in the video on your screen.

This isn’t ‘at-home training’, this is the real thing.

With thousands of routes to discover, workouts to choose from, and a community of coaches and athletes to connect with, our range and variety means you will never get bored using Kinomap.

Simply create an account on kinomap.com, download the app to your mobile or tablet and start your 14-day trial. Choose a video and explore the world!

If your equipment is not interactive, you can use the front camera of your tablet/smartphone as an optical sensor or connect additional sensors (cadence sensor, stride sensor, speed sensor, power sensor).

Training modes
• Motion videos
With thousands of videos available, travel the world by bike, foot or rowing machine. You can discover tourist routes, exotic landscapes thousands of kilometres from home, test your abilities on demanding routes with mythical passes. The world is yours.

• Coaching videos and structured workout
Progress and reach your goals with coaching videos and structured training. Customise your own sessions or choose sessions shared by the community.

• Multiplayer mode
Challenge your friends or Kinomap users in multiplayer mode and chat with them. Schedule your sessions in advance by inviting your followers or join public sessions!

• Free ride
Create your own ride! Keep track of your indoor sessions with the free training mode. Kinomap records your activity.

Other features :
• Social
Share your Kinomap sessions with the community or also by connecting to other sports applications like Strava or Runtastic.

• Display
A remote display is offered from a simple web browser from the page http://remote.kinomap.com.

Notes
• This app includes in-app purchases for auto-renewable subscriptions. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Play store account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.
Terms: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy
• Compatible with a lot of brands such as Kettler, BH Fitness, Wahoo Fitness, B’TWIN, Domyos, Tacx, Elite, Sportstech, Tunturi, DKN, Cardiostrong, Flow Fitness, Care Fitness, Toorx, Cycleops, Taurus, Capital Sports, JTX Fitness, Concept2, Sport Plus Minoura, Klarfit, Beter Sport, Minoura, Skandika, Kurt Kinetic, etc. but also any Bluetooth sensors (power sensor, speed & cadence sensor, heart rate sensor.)

If you have any issues or questions, please reach our support desk directly. This will help us to fix the issue if any as soon as possible. Your feedback is important to us so feel free to email us at support@kinomap.com.

title: Kinomap

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Kinomap is an interactive indoor training application for cycling, running, walking, and rowing, compatible with an exercise bike, home trainer, treadmill, elliptical or rowing machine. The application provides access to the largest geolocated video sharing platform with thousands of routes around the world. The application takes control of the equipment and automatically changes the resistance of the bike or the inclination of the treadmill according to the chosen stage. This isn't 'at-home training', this is the real thing!

Stay activ all year long with a motivating, fun and realistic sports application! Ride, run, walk or row alone or with others on the 5 continents. Explore new destinations from home, and join virtual challenges. Progress and reach your goals with structured training.

TRAINING MODES

- Outdoor Videos
With thousands of real-life videos, explore the best world stages. You'll be able to experience both scenic routes and exotic landscapes, or even test your skills on challenging courses.

- Coaching videos
Follow the advice of our community of coaches and train on their training programs to progress.

- Structured workout
Reach your goals by customizing your own sessions or by choosing the sessions suggested by Kinomap and the community.

- Map Mode
Train on your own GPS tracks or any a public track.

- Free ride
Keep track of your sessions because Kinomap records your activity directly from the connected console.

- Multiplayer
Challenge live your friends or the other users on the app. Schedule your private sessions with your followers or join public sessions.

WHY CHOOSING KINOMAP?
- Over 35,000 videos to train with an average of 30 to 40 new videos uploaded every day
- Compatible with any equipment

title: Kinomap: Ride Run Row Indoor

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Kinomap is an interactive indoor training application for cycling, running, walking, and rowing, compatible with an exercise bike, home trainer, treadmill, elliptical or rowing machine. The application provides access to the largest geolocated video sharing platform with thousands of routes around the world. The application takes control of the equipment and automatically changes the resistance of the bike or the inclination of the treadmill according to the chosen stage. This isn't 'at-home training', this is the real thing!

Stay activ all year long with a motivating, fun and realistic sports application! Ride, run, walk or row alone or with others on the 5 continents. Explore new destinations from home, and join virtual challenges. Progress and reach your goals with structured training.

TRAINING MODES

- Outdoor Videos
With thousands of real-life videos, explore the best world stages. You'll be able to experience both scenic routes and exotic landscapes, or even test your skills on challenging courses.

- Coaching videos
Follow the advice of our community of coaches and train on their training programs to progress.

- Structured workout
Reach your goals by customizing your own sessions or by choosing the sessions suggested by Kinomap and the community.

- Map Mode
Train on your own GPS tracks or any a public track.

- Free ride
Keep track of your sessions because Kinomap records your activity directly from the connected console.

- Multiplayer
Challenge live your friends or the other users on the app. Schedule your private sessions with your followers or join public sessions.

WHY CHOOSING KINOMAP?
- Over 35,000 videos to train with an average of 30 to 40 new videos uploaded every day
- Compatible with any equipment
- The most realistic indoor cycling, running and rowing simulator that almost makes you forget you're training from home
- 5 training modes to reach your goals and desires
- Suitable for everyone: cyclists, triathletes, runners, fitness or weight loss
- Free and unlimited version

OTHER FEATURES
- Synchronize your Kinomap activities with our app partners like Strava or adidas Running.
- The app is optimized for ismartphone and tablet. It is possible to display the videos on an external screen with HDMI adapter. A remote display is also possible from a web browser from the page https://remote.kinomap.com.
- Kinomap is compatible with the Apple Watch to receive heart rate data.

UNLIMITED ACCESS
The Kinomap application now offers a free version, with no time or usage limitation. The Premium version is available from 11,99€/month or 89,99€/year. The subscription is automatically renewed, unless it is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

COMPATIBILITY
Kinomap is compatible with over 220 brands of machines and 2500 models. Visit https://www.kinomap.com/v2/compatibility to check compatibility. Your equipment is not connected? Use a Bluetooth/ANT+ sensor (power, speed/cadence) or the optical sensor of your smartphone or tablet; it detects the movement and simulates the cadence.

Find the conditions of use on: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Confidentiality: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy

A problem? Please contact our support team at support@kinomap.com.
Do not hesitate to share your suggestions for improvement, requests for new features or questions.

- Kinomap is compatible with the Apple Watch to receive heart rate data.

UNLIMITED ACCESS
The Kinomap application now offers a free version, with no time or usage limitation. The Premium version is available from 11,99€/month or 89,99€/year. The subscription is automatically renewed, unless it is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

COMPATIBILITY
Kinomap is compatible with over 220 brands of machines and 2500 models. Visit https://www.kinomap.com/v2/compatibility to check compatibility. Your equipment is not connected? Use a Bluetooth/ANT+ sensor (power, speed/cadence) or the optical sensor of your smartphone or tablet; it detects the movement and simulates the cadence.

- Coaching videos
Follow the advice of our community of coaches and train on their training programs to progress.

- Structured workout
Reach your goals by customizing your own sessions or by choosing the sessions suggested by Kinomap and the community.

- Map Mode
Train on your own GPS tracks or any a public track.

- Free ride
Keep track of your sessions because Kinomap records your activity directly from the connected console.

- Multiplayer
Challenge live your friends or the other users on the app. Schedule your private sessions with your followers or join public sessions.

WHY CHOOSING KINOMAP?
- Over 40,000 videos to train with an average of 30 to 40 new videos uploaded every day
- Compatible with any equipment

- Suitable for everyone: cyclists, triathletes, runners, fitness or weight loss
- Free and unlimited version

- Synchronize your Kinomap activities with our app partners like Strava, adidas Running or other partners app.

Kinomap is compatible with over 220 brands of machines and 2500 models. Visit https://www.kinomap.com/v2/compatibility to check compatibility. Your equipment is not connected? Use a Bluetooth/ANT+ sensor (power, speed/cadence) or the optical sensor of your smartphone or tablet; it detects the movement and simulates the cadence.

The application takes control of the equipment and automatically changes the resistance of the bike or the inclination of the treadmill according to the chosen stage. This isn't 'at-home training', this is the real thing!

Stay activ all year long with a motivating, fun and realistic sports application! Ride, run, walk or row alone or with others on the 5 continents. Explore new destinations from home, and join virtual challenges. Progress and reach your goals with structured training.

TRAINING MODES

- Scenic Videos
With thousands of real-life videos, explore the best world stages. You'll be able to experience both scenic routes and exotic landscapes, or even test your skills on challenging courses.

- Coaching videos
Follow the advice of our community of coaches and train on their training programs to progress.

- Structured workout
Reach your goals by customizing your own sessions or by choosing the sessions suggested by Kinomap and the community.

- Map Mode
Train on your own GPS tracks or any a public track.

- Free ride
Keep track of your sessions because Kinomap records your activity directly from the connected console.

- Multiplayer
Challenge live your friends or the other users on the app. Schedule your private sessions with your followers or join public sessions.

WHY CHOOSING KINOMAP?
- Over 40,000 videos to train with an average of 30 to 40 new videos uploaded every day
- Compatible with any equipment
- The most realistic indoor cycling, running and rowing simulator that almost makes you forget you're training from home
- 5 training modes to reach your goals and desires
- Suitable for everyone: cyclists, triathletes, runners, fitness or weight loss
- Free and unlimited version

OTHER FEATURES
- Synchronize your Kinomap activities with our app partners like Strava, adidas Running or other partners app.
- The app is optimized for smartphone and tablet. It is possible to display the videos on an external screen with HDMI adapter. A remote display is also possible from a web browser from the page https://remote.kinomap.com.

UNLIMITED ACCESS
The Kinomap application now offers a free version, with no time or usage limitation. The Premium version is available from 11,99€/month or 89,99€/year. The subscription is automatically renewed, unless it is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

COMPATIBILITY
Kinomap is compatible with over 220 brands of machines and 2500 models. Visit https://www.kinomap.com/v2/compatibility to check compatibility. Your equipment is not connected? Use a Bluetooth/ANT+ sensor (power, speed/cadence) or the optical sensor of your smartphone or tablet; it detects the movement and simulates the cadence.

Find the conditions of use on: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Confidentiality: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy

A problem? Please contact our support team at support@kinomap.com.
Do not hesitate to share your suggestions for improvement, requests for new features or questions.

Thank you for practicing on Kinomap! We work every day to offer you the best possible experience.

• Discover the world and validate each region you visit with your Kinomap passport
• Ready to surpass yourself with our new feature? Set and exceed your goals in one session or over several weeks.
• Fixes and optimizations: Bugs, equipment updates, optimizations.

title:
Kinomap: Ride Run Row Indoor
4.1.8

creator: Kinomap
descriptionHtml:
Kinomap is an interactive indoor training application for cycling, running, walking, and rowing, compatible with an exercise bike, home trainer, treadmill, elliptical or rowing machine. The application provides access to the largest geolocated video sharing platform with thousands of routes around the world. The application takes control of the equipment and automatically changes the resistance of the bike or the inclination of the treadmill according to the chosen stage. This isn't 'at-home training', this is the real thing!

Stay activ all year long with a motivating, fun and realistic sports application! Ride, run, walk or row alone or with others on the 5 continents. Explore new destinations from home, and join virtual challenges. Progress and reach your goals with structured training.

TRAINING MODES

- Scenic Videos
With thousands of real-life videos, explore the best world stages. You'll be able to experience both scenic routes and exotic landscapes, or even test your skills on challenging courses.

- Coaching videos
Follow the advice of our community of coaches and train on their training programs to progress.

- Structured workout
Reach your goals by customizing your own sessions or by choosing the sessions suggested by Kinomap and the community.

- Map Mode
Train on your own GPS tracks or any a public track.

- Free ride
Keep track of your sessions because Kinomap records your activity directly from the connected console.

- Multiplayer
Challenge live your friends or the other users on the app. Schedule your private sessions with your followers or join public sessions.

WHY CHOOSING KINOMAP?
- Over 40,000 videos to train with an average of 30 to 40 new videos uploaded every day
- Compatible with any equipment
- The most realistic indoor cycling, running and rowing simulator that almost makes you forget you're training from home
- 5 training modes to reach your goals and desires
- Suitable for everyone: cyclists, triathletes, runners, fitness or weight loss
- Free and unlimited version

OTHER FEATURES
- Synchronize your Kinomap activities with our app partners like Strava, adidas Running or other partners app.
- The app is optimized for smartphone and tablet. It is possible to display the videos on an external screen with HDMI adapter. A remote display is also possible from a web browser from the page https://remote.kinomap.com.

UNLIMITED ACCESS
The Kinomap application now offers a free version, with no time or usage limitation. The Premium version is available from 11,99€/month or 89,99€/year. The subscription is automatically renewed, unless it is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

COMPATIBILITY
Kinomap is compatible with over 220 brands of machines and 2500 models. Visit https://www.kinomap.com/v2/compatibility to check compatibility. Your equipment is not connected? Use a Bluetooth/ANT+ sensor (power, speed/cadence) or the optical sensor of your smartphone or tablet; it detects the movement and simulates the cadence.

Find the conditions of use on: https://www.kinomap.com/en/terms
Confidentiality: https://www.kinomap.com/en/privacy

A problem? Please contact our support team at support@kinomap.com.
Do not hesitate to share your suggestions for improvement, requests for new features or questions.
